metadata.name: PUA - Ngrok Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Ngrok, a utility used for port forwarding and tunneling, often used by threat actors to make local protected services publicly available. Involved domains are bin.equinox.io for download and *.ngrok.io for connections.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tcp 139')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tcp 445')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tcp 3389')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tcp 5985')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tcp 5986')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' start ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--all')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--config')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.yml')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('ngrok.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tcp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' http ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' authtoken '))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe authtoken ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe start --all'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of Ngrok, a utility used for port forwarding and tunneling, often used by threat actors to make local protected services publicly available. Involved domains are bin.equinox.io for download and *.ngrok.io for connections.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Another tool that uses the command line switches of Ngrok 2. Ngrok http 3978 (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/bot-service/bot-service-debug-channel-ngrok?view=azure-bot-service-4.0) References: https://ngrok.com/docs, https://www.fireeye.com/blog/threat-research/2021/05/shining-a-light-on-darkside-ransomware-operations.html, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42442320/ssh-tunnel-to-ngrok-and-initiate-rdp, https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/58d21840d915aaf4040ceb89522396124c82f325282f805d1085527e1e2ccfa1/detection, https://cybleinc.com/2021/02/15/ngrok-platform-abused-by-hackers-to-deliver-a-new-wave-of-phishing-attacks/, https://twitter.com/xorJosh/status/1598646907802451969, https://www.softwaretestinghelp.com/how-to-use-ngrok/
